xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 1 Hetugocchaka » 1.3 Hetusampayuttaduka » 1.3.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Hetu
Hetugocchaka
Hetusampayuttaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Hetu
126.
349Hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  hetusampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
350Hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  hetusampayutte khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (2)
351(Iminā kāraṇena vitthāretabbaṃ yathā sahetukadukaṃ ninnānākaraṇaṃ.)
352Hetusampayuttadukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< 1.3.1--7 Paṭiccādivāraup1.4 Hetusahetukaduka >>
